content.html: it’s absolutely horrendous to see olympians, multiple newspapers, and countless tv pundits relentlessly harassing and smearing emily bridges for… being a good cyclist who happens to be trans? this country is terrified that trans people can and will thrive despite everything.
content.value:
it’s absolutely horrendous to see olympians, multiple newspapers, and countless tv pundits relentlessly harassing and smearing emily bridges for… being a good cyclist who happens to be trans?

this country is terrified that trans people can and will thrive despite everything.
